column5: Took my 6 year old son out for some perch, only spent 2 hours out there but found some fatties
Nice perch indeed. Hope the youngster got some.

Holy perch Batman!!  I realise you've got the trophy hold happening, but, how long were those babies?! I second Roy's sentiments, hope the little guy got to battle a few of those. Congrats on some nice table fare!
Wow, I've never seen a perch that big.
Ya the boy had a hoot, those were about 15", I wanted to get a picture with him holding them, but he didn't want to touch them,lol.
Beauty--definetely a couple fatties
congrats on the perch
biggest jumbos I ever seen.
They look like the godfathers of the perch underworld. Don't think I've seen perch that large before. Nicely done!
Wow!  Now thats what i call 'Grain Fed'. nice Jumbos
arent bass out of season?, ...oh wait
lol. those are some funny looking bass eh?....
delicio!.. yum yum... those are some fatty!.. thanks for sharin... when do we eat??.. lol
Wow those are the biggest perch I've ever seen! Nice catch!
Wow, those are some huge perch.  Yummy!!!!  Way to go
Those things are HUGE!! Good job Court! I bet your boy had a blast!
Very good fish. Great photo.
Gotta love old Lake E. Theres some monsters in there.
SWEET PERTCH  So mutch for pike bait..
those are the biggest perch ive ever seen, congrats!
